Title: One Hand Luch Mechanical Wristwatch Men's Vintage White 77471760. Refurbished
ConditionDescription: box was opened and returned by customer because he needed bigger size
Description: Single Hand Watch "Luch" Minsk Watch Plant "LUCH" is the only company in Belarus for the production of timing devices and one of the few companies in the Soviet watchmaking industry which retains full cycle of production of mechanical watches. Minsk Watch Plant became famous primarily by brand "Luch", but also it has produced, such well-known watch as "Zaria", "Vympel" and others. Since Soviet times, the plant produces car clocks and alarm clocks. Today except brand "Luch" MWP offers watches Favorit and Sekonda. In 2010, the Swiss company "Franck Muller International B.V." has became the investor company, having signed an Investment Agreement with the Republic of Belarus. SPECIFICATIONS One hand watch is a hand-wound mechanical shock resistant wristwatch from Luch. It's made on 15 jewels and covered with mineral glass what makes this watch more durable. Vintage design makes them look great not only on the original strap but also on the strap in different colors. This watch makes your look extraordinary and stylish at the same time. Advantages Mechanical 1801.1 15 jewels Shock resistant Original One Hand Quality management system ISO 9001. Luch one hand is an all-timer which will suit any time or place, will be the perfect partner to accompany you to every great occasion in your life so that every moment you live is right on time. It's time to be different! Kit: Watch - 1pc Strap - 1pc Passport - 1pc CHARACTERISTICS Movement Mechanical Hand Wound. 1801.1 Jewels 15 Dial Color White Logo Language Original in Russian Strap Material Leather Strap Width, mm / in 20mm / 0.78in Glass Silicate Glass Case Cover Chrome Water-resistance Daily water resistant (not suitable for swimming) Dial type Arabic Running time per winding 38 hours READ THE SINGLE-HAND WATCH
